question: The “Le Tour de Yoles Rondes de Martinique” is an annual boat race of which country?
explanation: The “Le Tour de Yoles Rondes de Martinique” is an annual sailing regatta on Martinique Island, an overseas region of France. It is Martinique Island’s largest sporting event, which takes place in late July and early August. It is a series of boat races in which crews circumnavigate Martinique Island on an eight-stage 180-kilometer course. This boat race is not only the national sporting event of Martinique but is unique to Martinique and is watched by nearly all the island’s population.
